definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The treatment of waste washed wool water with polymeric iron sulfate and activated clay as flocculating agent was studied in this article.
sentences.chinese: 以聚合硫酸鐵輔以活性白土爲絮凝劑處理洗羊毛污水。

sentences.english: In this paper dibutyl phthalate was synthesized with ferric sulphate as catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 以硫酸鐵爲催化劑，合成了鄰苯二甲酸二正丁酯。

sentences.english: It shows that ammonium ferric sulfate is active.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，硫酸鐵銨的催化活性良好。

sentences.english: Acetates were synthesized with ammonium ferric sulfate as catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 以十二水合硫酸鐵銨爲催化劑合成乙酸酯。

sentences.english: Polymeric ferric sulfate was prepared by pyrite cinder in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文進行了用硫鐵礦燒渣製備聚合硫酸鐵的實驗研究。
